greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of multinomials M(n-k; p_1-1, ..., p_k-1), where p = (p_1, ..., p_k) ranges over all partitions of n into distinct parts (k is a partition length).
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..731
maple: a:= n-> add(multinomial(n-nops(p), map(x-> x-1, p)[], 0),
b:= proc(n, i, p) option remember; `if`(i*(i+1)/2<n, 0, `if`(n=0, p!,
mathematica: a /@ Range[0, 31] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 09 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 22 2019
